column5: Just left the Oshawa store, all hunting and fishing is 15% off.
Thanks for the heads up. x2
Isn't everything 25% more to begin with? Always found that store pretty expensive.
Isn't everything 25% more to begin with? Always found that store pretty expensive.  I always found their prices to be very competitive, at least for the stuff I buy anyway.
On occasion they are out to lunch on price, but generally speaking I agree with you, they're pretty reasonable.
They have some of the best prices on salmon tackle.
my experience is that they come in lower than BP or cabellas
my experience is that they come in lower than BP or cabellas with more selection as the other 2 focus on the house brand vs what WE want and like
with more selection as the other 2 focus on the house brand vs what WE want and like  exactly  I dont like being force fed BP China brand.
my experience is that they come in lower than BP or cabellas  x2  X3
If you're shopping at Sail and you know another store has it cheaper, you can do a pricematch.
If you're shopping at Sail and you know another store has it cheaper, you can do a pricematch. Did that for my Okuma RAW II, went from $229 to $189 cause I said so
i think this is because Gagnon has sale this weekend too
They have some of the best prices on salmon tackle. 2/5 little cleo orange white glow worked best for last years salmon for me.  Better go stock up!

2/5 little cleo orange white glow worked best for last years salmon for me.  Better go stock up!  Thanks for the tip.  Are you talking about shore fishing in the fall; or, open lake trolling in the summer?
Thanks for the tip.  Are you talking about shore fishing in the fall; or, open lake trolling in the summer? shore fishing off the pier in the fall.
